skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Crafting pixel-perfect, responsive, and interactive user interfaces using modern technologies like React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, and ShadcnUI to deliver seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Building robust, scalable, and efficient server-side applications with Node.js, NestJS, Express.js, and MongoDB to power dynamic and data-driven platforms.

skills.title: No-Code
skills.description: Designing and customizing stunning websites using WordPress, Shopify, and Webflow for businesses seeking quick and hassle-free solutions.
